article.title: Discovering Network Peers
article.description: Once the Lite Listener is running, you'll need to find someone to sync with.

introduction.paragraph: There are many options for finding and connecting to other devices. Some are optimized for nearby devices, others rely on servers for peer discovery. The good news is that even as new peer discovery options become available, often they can be used by Couchbase Lite.
Some popular ways to discover peers.
